definition: to break (a bond, constraint etc)/to explain/to unravel/to decipher/to decode/to crack (software)
broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Depend on intuition and experience, he ases if the key that found baseball of the gold dollar that defeat solution.
sentences.chinese: 憑藉直覺和經驗，他彷彿找到了破解金元棒球的鑰匙。

sentences.english: Select the characters to use in brute-force cracking. Must be one of
sentences.chinese: 選擇字符使用蠻力破解。

sentences.english: 40A. It is very hard to break a code without the code book.
sentences.chinese: 沒有密碼本的情況下去破解密碼是很難的。

sentences.english: Passwords that are too weak of course invite brute-force attacks.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，弱密碼的確容易招致暴力破解攻擊。

sentences.english: Refreshingly enough, the myth-busting didn't always come from scientists.
sentences.chinese: 夠爽吧，破解神祕並不總是靠科學家。

sentences.english: In other words, those secure systems can be very easily brute forced.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，這些安全體系可能很容易被暴力破解。

sentences.english: Fourthly, it finds solution to the centurial problem.
sentences.chinese: 它找到了破解世紀難題的立足點。

sentences.english: The Caesar cipher is easy to break.
When in doubt, use brute force.
Camp life people left cut out the piece of skin, the resolution to work crack password nakamura.
sentences.chinese: 營左命人割下了那塊皮膚，決議讓中村功來破解密碼。

sentences.english: Here’s a little method I use to break negative thought patterns.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有種小方法，是我用來破解消極思維模式的。

sentences.english: I need to find a way to break the spell and win back my money.
sentences.chinese: 我得找到破解符咒的方法，把我的錢贏回來。

sentences.english: It is good way to avoid Brute Force attack .
sentences.chinese: 這是避免暴力破解的一個好方法。

sentences.english: When you break the version released?
sentences.chinese: 你們什麼時候放破解版？

sentences.english: SMTH crack essence. SMTH crack essence.
It's still easy to crack a normal word, even if it's inversed.
sentences.chinese: 它還是容易破解一個正常的話，即使它的反演。

definition: to eliminate/to do away with/to get rid of
to break a code/to crack a riddle/to solve an enigma/a breakthrough
to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
to dissolve/to resolve (contradictions)/to dispel (doubts)/to iron out (difficulties)/to defuse (conflicts)/to neutralize (fears)
to utilize/to put sth to use
move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
